attributes.action: Reject the PM's deal: put an option in the referendum to demand a democratic EU.
attributes.additional_details: You might see the DiEM25 site (http://diem25.org) and read some of Yanis Veroufakis' posts for some informative data.  It is not necessary to agree with the solutions, but only to understand the problems.
attributes.background: The PM's deal makes the EU nor more democratic and returns no sovereignty to the 28 states. We must be able to elect EU legislators and executive and be able to remove them. Others of the 28 states within the EU are demanding more democracy and an end to the secret deals struck between bureaucrats.
